verses.name: Isaiah 43:13
verses.text: Yea, before the day was I am he; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it?

verses.name: Isaiah 43:14
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, your redeemer, the Holy One of Israel; For your sake I have sent to Babylon, and have brought down all their nobles, and the Chaldeans, whose cry is in the ships.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:15
verses.text: I am the Lord, your Holy One, the creator of Israel, your King.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:16
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, which maketh a way in the sea, and a path in the mighty waters;
